course_title: Diagnostics and Clinical Reasoning: Adult/Gerontology Acute Care Nurse Practitioner
course_description: This course is designed to develop assessment and clinical reasoning skills along with application and analysis of evidenced-based theory to deliver care to the adult and gerontology patients promoting optimal health.
prerequisites: NRSG 544D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 5276, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
